title: Siviwe Mpondo
text: Siviwe Mpondo is a South African <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> player for the <a href="Tuks%20Bulls">Tuks Bulls</a> in the <a href="Rhino%20Cup">Rhino Cup</a>. His position is second row. He is a South African international, and has played in the <a href="2013%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup%20qualifying">2013 Rugby League World Cup qualifying</a> against <a href="Jamaica%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Jamaica</a> and the <a href="United%20States%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">USA</a>.
